item.description:
Morning Mountain Hike in celebration of CT Trails Day @ 8:00 a.m.

THIS HIKE HAS BEEN CANCELED DUE TO FORECAST OF HEAVY RAIN

Hike along the Avon Land Trust’s own beautiful Skyline Trail.  Discover the other, better and less-traveled trail to the Heublein tower.  This is a vigorous hike suitable for children 5 and up, adults of all ages, and leashed dogs.  Coffee & Breakfast treats will be served.

 

Meet at 8:00 a.m. at Hazen Park on Hazen Road, Avon CT 06001.

See map

 

 

=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Count me in" or "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
item.how_to_find_us: Avon Land Trust well have a table and guides at the trail head on Hazen Dr.

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: Canceled due to rain- Avon Land Trust- Heublein Tower - The Hidden Back Trail
